title: Hectares to Acres Converter (ha â‡„ ac)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: From hectares to acres To convert a land area from hectares to acres, multiply by 2.4710538147: \[ \text{acres} = \text{hectares} \times 2.4710538147 \] In everyday use you can safely round the factor to 2.47: \[ \text{acres} \approx \text{hectares} \times 2.47 \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: From acres to hectares To convert from acres to hectares, divide by the same factor (or multiply by its inverse): \[ \text{hectares} = \frac{\text{acres}}{2.4710538147} \] or \[ \text{hectares} = \text{acres} \times 0.4046856422 \]
